Html:
Hi everyone. What is the best way to achieve axis synchronization on multiple plotters?

I have a stack of plotters where i can add parameters, all parameter share the same timebase so their X axis need to be synchronized between the graphs (i.e. if a parameter on any plotter is updated with a new point, I'd like all parameters on any plotter to shift). Right now a i created myself a synchronized CursorCoordinateGraph so that the cursors between the graphs are coordinated no matter on which plotter i move the mouse on.

Do I need something similar for the axis (maybe with some synchronized Restriction) or I am following the wrong approach here and there is an easy, predefine way of achieving something similar?
